title: GriefPrevention求附属
author: SHIMH
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-10-26 17:26 编辑 

求一款GriefPrevention的附属
可以传送回自己的领地
别发原贴地址因为原插件没这个功能

自行解决
解决方法:于spogitmc下载claimteleport插件

replies.author: MisakaFish
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 我叫下冰雹 于 2019-10-26 12:36 编辑 

貌似没有这个  你只能用/claimslist查看位置  并不能传送Features/Commands
Adds a /nameclaim command that lets players assign names to individual claims.
Sorts the claims listed in the /claimslist command.
Shows the assigned name of the claim next to each claim. 
Adds clickable locations within the claim list output, allows players teleport to their claims with ease!
或许  这个插件可以帮助你 https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/claimclassifier
